医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蜂蜜对人体健康有什么作用？研究人员回顾了有关食用蜂蜜对人类健康有益影响的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/What-effect-does-honey-have-on- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/What-effect-does-honey-have-on- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ec1469-e19b-41e3-93eb-ab95db4f2932 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 05:42:00 -0400 What effect does honey have on human health?
既往抗生素治疗是否会影响 COVID-19 的严重程度？研究人员确定频繁使用抗生素是否会增加 SARS-CoV-2 感染后不良后果（包括死亡）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Does-previous-antibiotic-treatment-affect-COVID-19-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Does-previous-antibiotic-treatment-affect-COVID-19-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7455cf27-cad7-439b-9e34-aaa19013f526 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 05:15:00 -0400 Does previous antibiotic treatment affect COVID-19 severity?
SARS-CoV-2 在怀孕期间如何影响胎盘？研究人员使用转录组学检查胎盘内宿主对 SARS-CoV-2 的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/How-does-SARS-CoV-2-affect-the-placenta-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/How-does-SARS-CoV-2-affect-the-placenta-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17ea7d6a-55b1-4d74-9a8b-24d848f5045c Wed, 12 Jul 2023 05:10:00 -0400 How does SARS-CoV-2 affect the placenta during pregnancy?
COVID-19 大流行期间南美洲住院患者抗生素使用趋势研究人员评估了 COVID-19 大流行如何影响整个南美洲医疗机构中抗生素的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Trends-in-antibiotic-usage-among-in病人-in-South-America-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Trends-in-antibiotic-usage-among-in病人-in-South-America-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a947d28a-f756-4f17-85ce-dac70e1dfbee Wed, 12 Jul 2023 04:59:00 -0400 Trends in antibiotic usage among inpatients in South America during COVID-19 pandemic
诊断测试中未发现自我报告的长期新冠症状研究人员描述了 SARS-CoV-2 感染后与身体或心理功能相关的慢性症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Self-reported-long-COVID-symptoms-not-identified-in-diagnostic-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Self-reported-long-COVID-symptoms-not-identified-in-diagnostic-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c11827c7-26ab-4094-ae42-c4725d0bac6f Wed, 12 Jul 2023 04:45:00 -0400 Self-reported long COVID symptoms not identified in diagnostic tests
年龄较大和某些健康状况会增加接受增强个体的 COVID-19 死亡风险研究人员在英格兰接受第二次加强剂量的成年人中确定了因 COVID-19 死亡风险较高的患者群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Older-age-and-certain-health-conditions-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-death-in-boosted-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Older-age-and-certain-health-conditions-increase-risk-of-COVID-19-death-in-boosted-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b005f61-7d84-4e6f-99d6-238971c6b20a Wed, 12 Jul 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Older age and certain health conditions increase risk of COVID-19 death in boosted individuals
治疗性抗体的困难跨膜蛋白靶标在本次采访中，News-Medical 采访了义翘神州产品科学家 Sylvia Xie，讨论了跨膜蛋白作为治疗性抗体靶点的不断出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Difficult-transmembrane- Protein-targets-for-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Difficult-transmembrane- Protein-targets-for-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=582a2c80-561a-44a1-9942-ef9722ba5562 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 02:48:00 -0400 Difficult transmembrane protein targets for therapeutic antibodies
关于长期使用可卡因或酒精对认知灵活性的破坏性影响的新见解据美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 称，估计美国有 5000 万人正在与可卡因或酒精使用障碍的挑战作斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/New-insight-into-the-damaging-impact-of-chronic-cocaine-or-alcohol-use-on-cognitive-flexibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/New-insight-into-the-damaging-impact-of-chronic-cocaine-or-alcohol-use-on-cognitive-flexibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb9d5a51-ba02-40a1-ad50-92575438eb7b Wed, 12 Jul 2023 01:37:20 -0400 New insight into the damaging impact of chronic cocaine or alcohol use on cognitive flexibility
布鲁克推出便携式 MOBILE-IR II 光谱仪，将实验室级 FT-IR 分析带入现场布鲁克光学宣布推出 MOBILE-IR II——一款便携式、电池供电的傅里叶变换红外 (FT-IR) 光谱仪，可提供实验室台式系统的高光谱性能。这款功能强大的移动光谱仪将使世界各地的用户能够将常规和先进的 FT-IR 应用带到现场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Bruker-launches-portable-MOBILE-IR-II-spectrometer-to-bring-laboratory-grade-FT-IR-analysis-to-the-field。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Bruker-launches-portable-MOBILE-IR-II-spectrometer-to-bring-laboratory-grade-FT-IR-analysis-to-the-field。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a2b0482-2b9c-47ef-acfc-fd0dc1b955cb Wed, 12 Jul 2023 01:27:00 -0400 Bruker launches portable MOBILE-IR II spectrometer to bring laboratory-grade FT-IR analysis to the field
怀孕期间接触 CBD 可能会损害发育中的胎儿科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现，通常用于治疗焦虑和恶心的大麻二酚 (CBD) 可能会损害发育中的胎儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/CBD-exposure-during-pregnancy-can-潜在-harm-a-developmenting-fetus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/CBD-exposure-during-pregnancy-can-潜在-harm-a-developmenting-fetus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4988266b-10e0-44a3-bd93-e27303990190 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:53:42 -0400 CBD exposure during pregnancy can potentially harm a developing fetus
